message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.IT. 

The paper introduces a new algorithm for training Boltzmann Machines, which is a topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The algorithm is a variant of truncated Newton methods, which are commonly used in optimization (cs.NE). The paper also evaluates the algorithm on a task involving deep Boltzmann Machines, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper discusses the natural gradient metric, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT).
